131.content:
Chouji rubbed the back of his head as he pulled himself up from his bed. He heard a ripping noise and looked down to his pajama bottoms to see that they had ripped at the sides. Chouji grinned and poked his belly, "Guess i've put on some weight?" and weight was indeed what he had put on. Over the last few weeks Chouji had been eating more and training less, the results being that he had gained quite some pudge to his already doughy body. Chouji pulled himself from bed his bed and walked to his bathroom, which was only a short distance from his bed. As the teenage ninja walked, his new weight caused him to waddle left and right, but only slightly. Once in the bathroom, Chouji stepped onto the wornout scale and watched as the needle landed at two-nintey-eight. The overweight ninja blinked before an extremly happy smile spread across his face, "Two-nintey-eight? I've almost hit three hundred pounds!!" he yelled in joy as he shook his belly, which showed off why he was so big. His stomach was huge, as was the rest of his body. Chouji hurried out of his room as quickly as possible and got dressed in his usual clothes before hurring down stairs for breakfast.

His morning meal was already on the table, courtesy of his dad, who had already left for a mission. Breakfast didn't last long. Chouji leaned back in his chair and rubbed his belly which was skin tight against his huge shirt, "Aaaaaah... that was amazing. I can't belive I ate that much? I can't belive dad cooked that much?! I should go and see if i'm any heavier. That, or I could lounge around all day and just pig out and check before I go to bed?"
131.title: Discovering his new weight

1312.content:
He looked down at his belly as it growled, signaling that he was indeed still hungry. He started to rub it slowly. "I could get up," he started to say, "or I could just sit here and wait 'till I feel full... I mean, what's the point in burning all those calories?" He reached over to the fridge and started pullling out food by the handfuls, stuffng his face as quickly as he could grab the food, his large belly filling slowly as he ate. A few hours passed before he was finally out of food...

"Wow... I can't believe I finished off the whole fridge," he exclaimed, rubbing at his now bare belly, as his shirt was too tight to fit right now. "Should I risk getting up and weighing in, or should I see if I can't finish off some more food... hmm...," he pondered...

The chubby ninja finally reached his bathroom and sigh, tired from using so much energy, "I knew I should have just sat in the kitchen and ate. Now..." Chouji stepped onto the scale and stroked his stomach, "Let's see how much weight."

The ninja sucked in his stomach slightly so that he could see the numbers and looked down. The arrow had stopped at three-fifteen. Chouji could feel his smile spreading across his face, "No way!! I gained seventeen pounds in two hours!!" Chouji jumped off of the scale, his fat jiggling around as he danced a happy dance. He then stopped and thought aloud, "If I gained that much in two hours... I wonder how much I could gain in four?"

Chouji hurried out of his bathroom and into the kitchen to eat what he could.

blinking Kiba asked, "what... do you mean?"

naruto laughed, "Choji here can eat other ninjas! and was thinking about how you'd be really tasty!"

"wha-!? is that even possible!?" Kiba asked, startled.

"sure it is!" naruto assured. "feel my belly! there's a clone of choji inside that Master choji allowed me to have!"

after checking and noting the slight wiggles from withing Kiba asked, "what do you mean, "master Choji"?"

grinning, Naruto responded, "well, he's helping me the second most gluttonous ninja of all! and as thanks for him not just making me into fat for him, and letting my clones take the fall, and then agreeing to allow me to follow his path, I have made him my sensei in the path to bigger belly sizes!"

"o...k..." kiba nods. then looking at the very hungry Choji he responds, "well, I don't want to be dog food, so how about you quickly tell me about solid cloning and I can let him enjoy that. I may be too full to move now, but I have enough chakra to make a clone to help Choji... but one question, why is he the master of bigger bellies, if he is the smallest right now?"

sweating lightly, naruto responds, "that's only cause I have a clone of him in me that is still digesting! and you ate a ton of food, he has finished digesting and is hungry! so he can get much bigger!"

"oh, so he's on an empty stomach right now... and he's still that big!? wow... now I see why he's your sensei." kiba nodded.

Choji was quite tired of this babbling and wanted food, so he licked the large dog belly, and noted that he even smelled more like a dog, and he was delicious! "I would hurry, little doggies, or I might just make you food as you are." he commented.

nodding quickly, Kiba asked naruto for the way to make the solid clones, and after a rather annoyingly long time, he finally made one. "there..." Kiba panted, out of his chakra now, "thanks for... waiting..."

Choji was leaning on a tree and grunted, "I would have eaten you by now, but Akamaru caught on quicker than you and made a clone to tide me over so I didn't eat you."

gulping nervously, Kiba replied, "sorry Choji, I'm not as good with solid clones." he then hugged his dog and said to the flabby pooch, "Thanks Akamaru! I'll make sure you get your favorite treats in bulk tomorrow." as he looked up, the dog ninja saw the rump end of his clone being tasted as it slid into Choji's hungry maw. "whoa... that was... somehow very neat. and somewhat scary... I wouldn't have even had time to react. and how did he stretch so much!?"

naruto laughed, "I don't know how he stretches so easily, but I can show you how to stretch a little like me, but you have to become a student of Chojis too!" at this, choji grinned. the little fox-boy was promoting more members to help feed his ever-growing gut. with a loud gulp, the final flabby bits of the dog-boy-clone slid into the hungry young ninja.

"I think I will join you in the quest for bigger stomachs." Kiba agreed happily.

entering his large house, the equally large boys waddled around to the kitchen.

"so, do you wanna finish eating now?" Naruto asked.

grinning, Choji replied, "you guys need a little more rest, plus, I wanna check out how much we weigh! my parent's are out on a mission at the moment, and will be gone for at least the weekend, so we can gorge here all we want!" rubbing his belly he added, "I will need you to make me some clones, one or two of each of you should tame my hunger, before we go to bed for the night, after all, you guys have had a rough day feeding me. I'm proud of your hard work, and I'll let you gorge on junk food tomorrow and teach you how to convert a tiny amount of fat into chakra so you don't get worn out from making clones. I don't want my little fox and doggies to get too tired, huh?"

going to the large bathroom, choji nodded to the scale. being the tiniest, but still quite overweight, Akamaru went over first, the smart, round little puppy weighed an amazing, especially for a puppy, 205 pounds! the obese dog smiled happily and wagged his tail. allowing the fox-boy up next, Naruto found he had become a stout 420. nodding he sighed a little at being the tiniest human here, but knew he was still exceptionally fat for a normal human, and would only get bigger. Kiba was about a hundred pounds heavier than naruto, so the 514 pound dog boy happily patted his belly, wishing he had a tail like akamaru to show how nice it felt to be this big! Choji waddled onto the huge scale and wondered how it didn't creak under his weight even now, especially since he was 868 pounds, and wondered if his dad was even bigger than this, since it was his scale and all. hugging his friends and food sources, Choji told the crew of other fatties how proud he was of their weight gain in such a short time, and they commented on how it was all thanks to him. he grinned, now definitely happy he didn't eat naruto back then and let them just feed him clones. he had basically an endless food source, and his waist was continually getting bigger and softer.

going to Choji's room, the "student" boys fed their "teacher" and he surprised them with some chocolate and other sweets and after the four had gorged, they felt really tired and choji brought out some super-elastic pajamas for everyone, except akamaru, who got a cute little nightcap. laying around the room, and using the other's bellies for pillows, the group fell into a nice long slumber.

At about 4:00 in the morning, Choji woke to the sound of his own belly growling loudly. Obviously the glutton couldn't go a few hours without a feeding, and as he didn't wish to wake any of his students up, he waddled off as slowly and quietly as he could to the kitchen; the only issue with this being the fact that someone as large as he could not move very quietly, and upon exiting, awoke one of the two human students...

Choji found the refrigerator completely stocked full of all his favorite fattening foods, and in bulk- obviously his dad had planned ahead for this trip, and for his own son's comfort whilst they were away. Immediately, the largest ninja in the village began to dig into the delicious, tantalizing foods, unaware of the lurking fatty who watched Choji stuff himself in awe.

"I wonder, could I finish all of the food Dad left in a single sitting," he mused gleefully, stroking his obviously hungry belly, which had managed to digest most of his meal of delicious ninjas from several hours earlier, his elastic pajamas riding up a bit on his now fatter belly. After a few moments of bemusement, the obese ninja grinned and dug in. From the shadows, his observed stepped to confront Choji, and offer to feed him, both food and ninja clones...

I know Naruto would, but if I told him to stop he probably would." Choji chuckled.

"anyway, I want you to try to eat as much as you can, you can't let your belly grow if you don't stuff yourself silly." choji then began eating again.

long before the huge pile of food was eaten, Kiba felt completely stuffed, and looked like he was, too. the dog-boy rolled onto his huge gut and began to massage the oversized belly. kiba sighed happily and let out a belch from his stuffed state.

noting something odd about the other, happy pudgy ninja, Choji asked, "hey Kiba... when did you grow a tail?"

blinking, Kiba responded, "I have a tail?" and looking around his bulging belly, he saw that he had indeed grown a tail, and it resembled a larger version of Akamaru's only black, like his hair. he also noted his ears looked puppy like as well. "wow... now I really am a dog-boy!" he laughed.

"indeed you are." choji agreed, while rubbing the scruffy part dog ninja's belly with one hand, and eating a sandwich with the other. he smiled as he watched the tail wag and the jiggling it cause in it's owner's fat body.

suddenly choji hears something...
152222211111122122.title: Kiba's tail

1522222111111221221.content:
looking up, the chubby human noticed a small shape exiting his house. at first he thought it might be akamaru, but the puppy had gained more weight that what had left. quietly informing Kiba, the two ninja decided to follow the tiny creature. though not nearly as stealthy as before, they were still ninja, and managed to sneak after the tiny shadow fairly easily in the open. once the duo got close enough, they noticed it was a tiny kitsune. and it bore the unmistakable nine tails of Kyuubi. looking in surprise at one another, they noticed the tiny thing casting a ninjutsu on the very air around them. the kitsune chuckled and began to scamper back to choji's house, but instead bumped into choji's belly. gasping at the realization he was spotted, the fox tried to escape, but was snatched up by choji. "let me go fatty!" Kyuubi grunted, his voice sounding squeaky in this form.

"careful what you say, or you might add to my fattiness." Choji chuckled. "now tell me what you just did, and maybe I'll let you choose who eats you."

"wait! you can't! I keep naruto alive! my chakra keeps his naturally frail body working right!"

"hmm, I suppose you are right, and how are you out of him anyway!?"

"simple!" Kyuubi responded, "I realized that since he was so fat, I could force enough chakra for a tiny clone of myself through his navel, since that is where the seal that holds me is placed, and thusly where I am basically. so I molded a body, and put my consciousness into it."

"so basically your body, and most of your chakra is in naruto?"

"yeah. so?" kyuubi asked.

"that means if we eat you, no one can try to control naruto, and you power will eventually be his... and since he looks up to me, quite possibly mine." Choji grinned.

the tiny fox's jaw dropped as he realized this was true. gasping, kyuubi pleaded, "don't eat me! I'm defenseless in this form! I can help you increase you chakra! and... and..." the kitsune was suddenly at a loss for words, as he was unused to feeling frightened.

"again, what ninjutsu did you use." Choji demanded.

"oh... I uh... made a ninjutsu I created too bring out one's... other selves." kyuubi responded quietly, not wanting to upset the human who could easily eat him whole.

"and what does that mean!?" Kiba asked.

"it's what I cast on you and naruto..." kyuubi started before the hand gripping him tightened.

"you did something to my students!?" Choji growled.

"but... I only... made him more dog like." Kyuubi wheezed.

"wait... you did that!?" both humans asked.

"y-y-yes." Kyuubi whimpered.

releasing his grip a little Choji nodded. "fine, I actually like the addition. so what does it do to everyone else?"

"I only had enough chakra to cast it on the males, but it will turn all the guys in the village who are gluttons into part-animal forms. I just thought it would look funny, after hearing all of you talk about calling each other names like "dog-boy" and "fox-boy" and I knew most of the others were like that too... oh, and it might make some normal eaters into gluttons too."

"impressive." Choji grinned. "more food supply, and in new flavors too." he chuckled. "I feel like kitsune right now though." he muttered, and after seeing the frightened look from the chubby fox, he added, "but I'll let you go on three conditions."

"sure! sure!" Kyuubi agreed.

"first, you must join as my newest student in fatness."

"you mean I have to get fat?" Kyuubi whined.

"either get fat, or be fat."

"fine... I was super-skinny for many years, I might as well try it out." Kyuubi nodded.

"two: you must make me a clone now for me to eat. I want to taste what the legendary kyuubi tastes like." choji licked his lips.

"I used all my chakra. and my actual body is in Naruto... I have to get chakra from him... in other words, I need to use him like a battery first, touching him should be good enough."

Kiba then asked, "how do we know you won't get enough chakra to eat us!"

"because I can only get so much, not only is this body small, but I can't pull anymore essence through, and it can't hold much chakra at the moment... maybe when I get it fatter, the larger body would help."

"how do we know you aren't lying!" Kiba accused.

"I... don't know how to lie yet... I never needed to. I was always so strong lies were useless." the kitsune sighed.

choji nodded. "well, I'll believe ya! I trusted your host, and Naruto has been loyal to a tee so far. so I'll let his honesty assist your plea. and I'll extend your time to get me a clone until we get a chance. and now demand three: I get to choose what animal I become."

"ok! I may not have any chakra, but the part of my ninjutsu I cast can be controlled if I alter it slightly." kyuubi nodded. touching the large ninja's belly with his tiny little paw, he asked, "now tell me what you want to be, the effect will happen soon."

"hmm..." choji thought "I'll be..."

drowsily waking up, Kyuubi rubbed his head before being smooshed by something soft and warm next to him. he recognized the smell and heat as his host, Naruto. looking up, he saw the human lad was still asleep, but was hugging the kitsune close to his belly, which kyuubi had to admit, wasn't bad. giving in to the softness of the foxboy's belly, he barely notice his own gut. he had forgotten the gluttony he went through the night before during his "inauguration". his belly made the nine-tailed fox look like a ball of blubber, he was almost completely symmetrical around his waist, and it was so soft too. calming down, the kitsune rubbed lightly over his bulging belly as he remembered his promise to gain weight. he had to admit it wasn't bad. and feeding his... leader, was not bad either. as long as it wasn't actually him being eaten, he may have been exceptionally old for a human, but he was still pretty young, being almost immortal. he was also amused at the feeling and appearance of the flabbyness spreading throughout the male population of Kanoha. he would've most likely helped them get bigger even if he was at full power, but being a part of it was neat too. curling up next to the warm body that until recently he wanted nothing more than to flee from, the fuzzy orange-ish red kitsune nuzzled the sleeping ninja next to him.

downstairs, Choji was looking for more food. his enormous gut made him look wider than he was tall now, and he was certain he could make it bigger very quickly. he leaned on the soft belly of the sleeping dog-boy that had been too full from last night to make it to his bedroom, so he was sleeping on the couch. Choji wanted to wake the boy to feed him, but decided to let him rest for now, his dog-like features made him look so puppy-like while he slept, a fat puppy at that. sighing, he decided to check his dad's room. he knew he might get in trouble, but he was hungry, and his dad would be more proud of his belly than mad at his intrusion, the now hog boy thought. sneaking into the large room, he went to one of his father's locked doors and used a key that he found easily. inside...

burping, choji shrugs, "I don't know."

15222221111112212211212.title: too much food!

152222211111122122112121.content:
As Naruto, Chouji, Kiba and the mini Kitusne lay in Chouji's father's room unconsious, The Village of Konoha was bustling, but one thing was certain; The three Genin weren't the only guys in Konoha getting fat.

The entire male population of Konoha was gaining weight at an astounding rate. As the front gates to the village opened, Akimichi Chouza, the father of the gluttonous hero of this story, waddled in. He stood tall and proud, one hand on his full stomach, which expanded far in front if him. His clothes seemed to fit him perfectly, despite weighing almost eight-hundred pounds, thanks to an Akimichi family jutsu. As Chouza walked in, the first thing that he noticed were Kotetsu Hagane and Izumo Kamizuki, the two Chunin who watched over the gates. The two were leaning back and had their vests off, shirts pulled up to reveal their bellies. Chouza wasn't sure what they were saying, but he guess that the two were debating over who was bigger, which was Kotetsu. He smiled and continued on his way into the village as the rest of his team went to the Hokage to report on their mission.

As Chouza waddled through the gaining village, he noticed two other Jonin through an open window of a buffet that had just recently been built; Asuma and Kakashi. Asuma had one hand hanging out the window, a lit cigarette between his index and middle finger, smoke floating into the air from it's tip. His other hand was busy forcing food into his mouth. Kakashi sat opposite of him, re-reading the first volume of Icha Icha Paradise. He wasn't eating. Asuma dropped the bone of an extremely large chicken leg onto a pile and placed the cigarette to his lips. He took a deep breath and exhaled, smoke flying everywhere, "I don't get it Kakashi. Your the one who invited me to lunch, and your not even gonna eat?"

"I'm not that hungry." Kakashi said, turning the page in his book before placing his hand on his fat stomach, which had grown very round in the last few days.

Asuma rolled his eyes and finished the rest of his cigarette before butting it out in the ash tray on the window sill and using both hands to eat. Kakashi looked up at Asuma and the savage way he ate. He chuckled and went back to his book. Kakashi decided that he'd wait until he got home to stuff himself, a habit he'd gotten into as of recently.

Chouza waddled over to the open window and smiled, "It's seems the two of you are getting quite big." he said happily.

Asuma looked up and grinned. He sat back in the large seat and slapped his even larger gut, "Oh yeah. This babies gonna get huge!" Asuma was wearing the standard Jonin uniform, with his sash hanging from his large waist, the only difference was the size. It was extremely small. The vest didn't fit at all and his shirt was raised high up, revealing his tan, hairy stomach. The part of the shirt that covered his massive breasts was exteremly tight and looked like it was going to rip, "This is the last outfit I own that halfway fits me. The rest of I ended up tearing cause I they were to small." Asuma stroked his stomach and laughed, "Pretty soon, the same'll happen to these clothes."

"Well, I could always use the clothing expansion jutsu for you." Chouza offered.

"No thanks. Asuma said, "I've already bought two more outfits that fit, and I plan on ripping those two."

Chouza nodded and looked at Kakashi, "So how much do the two of you weight?"

"342 pounds." Kakashi said, not turning from his book.

"793 pounds!" Asuma said, proudly.

Chouza was impressed by Asuma's weight, he was only five pounds behind him, but was dissapointed by Kakashi, "Tell you what, guys. Stop by my house in an hour and the three of us will stuff ourselves silly. What do you say?"

"Of course!! I'd never turn down an offer for food!" Asuma said excited, while Kakashi merely shrugged. Chouza smiled and bid the two farewell.

It was a short walk, or rather waddle, from the buffet to his house. Chouza walked inside and went straight to his room to change from his armor to more comfortable clothing. When he opened the door, he saw his son, along with Naruto, Kiba, and a small orange fox. Naruto’s ears had been replaced with fox ears, and there was a fox tail sticking out of his lower back. Kiba had the same, but they were black and resembled pointy dog ears, with a matching tail and his son had pig ears, tiny tusks pointing up from his lower jaw, and a pig tail that he couldn’t see at the moment. The small, fat fox was laying on top of Chouji’s stomach, sleeping. All three of them were incredibly fat.

Chouza noticed that his locker doors were open and a tiny amount of food was missing. He wasn’t angry, just... shocked!! Before he could do anything, one of the boys woke up. It was...

1522222111111221221121211.title: Chouji wakes up

15222221111112212211212111.content:
"CHOUJI!!" The Pig-boy's father said happily, "Look at you!! Your huge!! You MUST be bigger then I am!!"

Chouji grinned and his pig-ears pointed skyward happily, "Really, Dad?! Your not mad?"

"Mad? How could I be mad!? I'm proud to know that my son is so fat!!" Chouza hugged his gigantic son, his massive gut pressing against Chouji's, squishing the small Kitsune between their huge bellies. When Chouza pulled back, the Kitsune shook it's head before grinned and jumping from Chouji's belly to his fathers. Chouza smiled and petted the mini-fox, "And who is this?"

"That's the nine-tailed fox, Dad. He was able to create a small clone and escape through Naruto's bellybutton, but we stopped him from escaping. He's my pet now. Well, technically, he's my second pet." Chouji said as he scratched his still sleeping, fat puppy. Kiba's leg kicked in his sleep and his tail wagged, Causing his fat to giggle all around.

"What about Naruto?" Chouza asked.

"Naruto is... well... he's more of a student/food supply."

"Food supply?" Chouza grinned, "You used the Devourment Jutsu, didn't you?"

Chouji licked his lips at the mere mention of his favorite jutsu, "Yep. I've been eating shadow clones."

"That's my boy."

Naruto was almost immediately spotted-- this jutsu was widely recognized at this point and it didn't take long for someone to spot him, shriek, and throw something at him, voiding the jutsu, but not before he was able to get a picture, sheepishly squirming out and back to the sprawled out Konohamaru, who was stroking his bare gut slowly and deliberately.

"I-I got it...," he said, his face red both from being hit and from blushing at what he had been made to do, but the large ninja held out his hand and shook Naruto's.

"A deal's a deal. Where's your master at? I'll meet with him," he said, a smirk across his gluttonous lips as he slowly hefted his stuffed body up, already starting to digest away what he had consumed and filled himself with-- he was really going to be a force to be reckoned with.
1522222111111221221121211121111212111112.title: Not that trick again!

choices: Konohamaru, Naruto, Kiba, and the rest have a conversation.......
1522222111111221221121211121111212111112.content:
Kiba bound along tree tops alongside Inoichi for half an hour until they arrived at Kin'niku Baundo-Mura, or the Muscle Bound Village. Upon entering the village Kiba and Inoichi stopped at a very close museum, free today only, which depicted the history of the city starting from very ancient times. The first mural depicted 5 huge men bowing to a god-like depicted fat deity, seeming to be an Akimichi, and built a whole city for this deity's worship and service.

"So this village basically worships fat people, seemingly Akimichis more than most, as if they were gods." Kiba said.

"Let's go to the palace. Their leader is there." replied Inoichi.

As they were approaching town square all the buff inhabitants that were heading that way rolled out a red carpet, and bowed down chanting and saying, "We are not worthy," repeatedly over and over.

When they reached town square they were stunned beyond belief. A massive statue of Choji was erected and all the Villages members bowed with a preacher standing yelling out, "Bow to the Lord Almighty! Bow to your Savior! He has come to deliver us from our distress, so worship him and he will be merciful!"

Inoichi and Kiba walked up the North Road unnoticed as the worship festival continued.

Soon they reached the palace, and the guards reverenced, and both lifted their bulging arms and opened the double doors, saying simultaneously, "Enter messengers from our Savior, and bring you message to our leader."

They entered and saw a massive 7 foot tall, 600 pound muscle man sitting in his throne wearing nothing but a purple jewel-encrusted crown, cape, and matching speedo, as it was the custom of the village to not wear much while within the village, as they found it depriving their gods of threads their fat deities growing stomachs so desperately needed.

"Welcome! Inoichi informed me of your coming. It comes to my attention you need men from our village for assistance, as men from yours are rapidly expanding fro "The Change". I'll send a squadron of our 4 largest, 4 of our warrior clan larger than myself, they'll use a summoning scroll to bring forth a ruby-encrusted silk Litter (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Litter_(vehicle) ) to transport him to his temporary palace while the new Hokage's quarters are being built. I'll be sending more and more of our men daily. Builders, servants, and our largest 1,000 to surround the village to protect it, as I've heard whispers of the Village Hidden in the Clouds, as well as the Mist are very opposed to "The Change", thinking it's a plot to gain immense chakra levels and become an Empire. There will be 3 squadrons at each gate every hour until a sufficient amount of men have been sent over."

Four 7'8" clothed men, varying from the smallest at 688 lb, to the largest of them by far, Mako, who weighed a staggering 888 lb of bulging muscle, who their leader informed will be assigned as Choji's personal guard.

Mako carried Kiba, and one of the others carried Inoichi, as the 6 of them travelled back to the village, and got to the road leading to Choji's house, before meeting Naruto and Konohamaru.....
1522222111111221221121211121111212111112.title: Kin'niku Baundo-Mura

choices: Choji finishes his training and greets his new apprentice
one of the others allows the comparitively thin deer boy with a clone to eat.
1522222111111221221121211121112.content:
hearing a knock at the door, Kakashi mumbled, "well, one of us should probably get that, since Choji is busy."

Naruto, who had finally decided to start gorging again got up, stretched and replied, "I'll go. just give me and arm-full of food to snack on." waddling downstairs, the fox boy opened the front door and saw Shikamaru. Naruto smiled and asked, "you looking for Choji? he's a little busy right now..." Naruto stopped his talking to stuff a leg of ham into his mouth.

supressing a smile at seeing the shirtless fox boy devour the food, he subconsciously rubbed his small potbelly that had formed last night mysteriously. "did you get that big over night, Naruto?"

"nope! been pigging out with Choji though. you wanna join his glutton club?" Naruto asked.

"well..." Shikamaru wanted to say no, but for some reason he felt otherwise.

"I think you do." Naruto laughed. "and I see Kyuubi made you into your name, a deer-man."

rubbing the small horns on his head, his tail twitched lightly and he sighed, "fine... I can't get over how hungry I am... wait, you said kyuubi!" the deer-boy gasped.

"shh... I only let you know cause you are gonna be part of our group anyway, but Kyuubi has managed to get a tiny version of himself out of my awesome body and is helping us gain. he's actually adorable with all those layers of pudge." Naruto laughed.

"you think I'm cute?" Kyuubi asked, while peeking out from behind the staircase.

"yes, lil kitsune." Naruto agreed. "now go upstairs and blubber yourself up some more, ok?"

grinning the obese kitsune nodded, shaking his big cheeks and chins and floated upstairs with his chakra. Shikamaru shrugged, "well, since there's free food, and... well I'm sure you guys make great pillows, why not. let's go eat!"

"well..." Naruto warned, "Choji will make you make clones for him to eat... and soon he'll learn a technique so he can revive us after eating us for real."

"he want to eat us?" Shikamaru gasped, his ears standing on end.

"don't worry, we're his friends so we are safe. that's why he waited to learn the revival technique... I'll let Kiba explain it, I'm not as good with words." Naruto admitted.

thinking, Shikamaru decided he just had to eat something, and the idea of being his friend's food was... oddly not too bad when he was told it was safe. following the fox boy up the stairs, which he assisted the far fatter ninja in doing, he smiled as he watched naruto's belly wobble, something about belly juggling was fascinating to him all of a sudden.
1522222111111221221121211121112.title: the Deer arrives!

choices: later, Choji finally gets done training
15222221111112212211212111211122.content:
Wandering upstairs, the now ravenous deer-boy greeted his friends and comrades in gaining, Shikamaru munched on food while listening to Kiba explain how things have been going, in between his own stuffing of course, and oddly felt the desire to gobble another ninja down himself, so when he learned of how Naruto inadvertently made a way to glut on each other and still be a pig themselves, as well as perfectly safe, he asked Kiba, "do you think I could try and see if I could gobble one of your clones?"

"the deer wants to eat a dog, eh?" Kiba laughed. "fine. Naruto taught me how to make solid clones for Choji, so why not?" making one, Kiba admired how he looked by eyeing his clone, and giving it a pat on the belly. "you know, I wonder how I taste?" Kiba began giggling as he thought of how odd it would be to eat a clone of himself, yet he was tempted to do so at some point.

after patting the clone's bare belly Shikamaru mused quietly, "it's almost to huggable to eat, but so tasty looking too." and proceeded to try and eat the clone... unfortunately his mouth couldn't even wrap around the clone's head.

"hmm..." Kyuubi thought. "Choji has a ninjutsu to stretch a lot, Naruto is both a natural eater and has some of my power, and Kiba has trained himself to stuff his mouth, but you don't have those benefits..."

"then... am i unable to eat clones like all of you?" Shikamaru sighed.

"not normally, but I can use a permanent jutsu to make you able to." Kyuubi responded.

"really!?" the deer boy asked, suddenly happier. nodding, the small round fox demon made various quick motions with his round little paws, which made it impossible for even kakashi to tell which signs the kitsune was making, and with a quick press to the sides of the part cervine human, the ninjutsu was done. "awesome" he laughed.

"glad you approve." Kyuubi laughed quietly. "I am too little of my old self... I am out of chakra after just that... I have to nap now, hope Choji doesn't need me too soon." and with that, the kitsune fell onto his belly and promptly started snoring.

"you were right... he is adorable." Shikamaru laughed. turning back to the clone he eagerly began consuming the flabby clone, enjoying all the blubber Kiba had been putting on, especially the big soft belly. all too soon, he finished his dog-food and belched, rubbing his overly stretched gut filled to the max with more food than he had eaten in an entire year before. "you are huge Kiba! I can't wait to see how Choji looks if he's bigger than you!" pausing to relish in the feeling of fullness, he added, "I always did think that his body frame looked best out of all of our peers. now we all are getting blubbery together!"
15222221111112212211212111211122.title: one of the others allows the comparitively thin...

152222211111122122112121112111222.content:
Kiba's curiosity had gotten the best of him. While everybody was busy eating, Kiba created a clone of himself, and as soon it had formed, he felt his stomach growl loudly. He grinned as he grabbed his clone by the shoulder's and pulled it's head into his mouth, which began to stretch as he tried to eat his clone. Kiba's belly pressed agasint the belly of his clone, making it look like one massive sea of doggy-flesh. His tail wagged happily as his jaw stretched wider to fit the clone's shoulders into his mouth. He continued to eat, pushing his flabby chest into his mouth, but he began to have trouble with his belly. It took a good ten minutes for Kiba to eat his clone's belly, and the rest of it went down easily after that. Kiba groaned once he felt the dog clone slide into his belly and fell onto his back, rubbing his now massive gut. This was the most full he had been since he had begun training under Choji.

Shikamaru watched, amazed at the sight of Kiba eating his own clone. Now he was REALLY excited to see his best friend massively fat.
152222211111122122112121112111222.title: Kiba eat his own clone
